greeting.title: 이연섭
greeting.subTitle: A passionate individual who always thrives to work on end to end products which develop sustainable and scalable social and technical systems to create impact.

skills.title: Full Stack Development

⚡ Developing applications using Flutter, React Native and solo android apps using Kotlin

descriptions: ⚡ I have studied basic software engineering subjects like DS, Algorithms, DBMS, OS etc.
⚡ Apart from this, I have done courses on Deep Learning, Data Science, Cloud Computing and Full Stack Development.
⚡ I was selected for Dean’s list in 2017 fall and 2018 spring semester

experiences.title: Experience
experiences.subtitle: Work, Internship and Volunteership
experiences.description: I have worked with evolving startups as Full-Stack developer. I contributed to build an scalable web application using lots of technologies.

work.title: Software Developer (Full-Stack Developer)
work.description: As a member of the data platform team, I focused on writing code to support data processing, including writing, updating, reading, validating, and formatting data with Typescript. I was involved in changing data store from PostgresSQL to MongoDB for  scalability. For that I implemented DBConnector for CRUD operations with MongoDB in NodeJS environment

intern.title: Software Developer Intern
intern.description: I contributed on building the company's main product, a series of mobile-optimized, consumer-facing news sites with an internal content management system. I added new search field on CMS so that editors can find certain post easier. I also made new ad templates that are now used on all company websites to improve inefficient ad rendering process on Google Ad Manager

projectsHeader.title: Projects
projectsHeader.description: My projects makes use of vast variety of latest technology tools. My best experience is to create Data Science projects and deploy them to web applications using cloud infrastructure.
